Initializer# init(amount:currency:)

PassKitSwiftUIiOS 17.0+iPadOS 17.0+visionOS

```
nonisolated
init(
    amount: Decimal,
    currency: Locale.Currency
)
```

Available when `FallbackView` is `EmptyView`.
